options.text: Success is a 20% PM time reduction within 6 months.
options.why: Allows tracking of time savings in existing workflows.

options.text: Aim for 25% increase in team throughput in 3 months.
options.why: Boosts productivity, easy to measure via output volume.

options.text: Achieve 30% reduction in project delays within 6 months
options.why: Directly impacts team efficiency and client satisfaction
